short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mitigates some of the design choices regarding Last.fm in the form of a handy options menu.
short.pl: Pozwala na zmianę niektórych opcji dotyczących wyglądu Last.fm w formie wygodnego menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I wrote this addon primarily for myself, but I figured I might as well share it with the other four people who still use Last.fm. Turn it on and leave it be or untick some checkboxes if you want, depending on what suits your fancy.
